mapper.insert: insert into member(idx, username, userid, pwd, hp1, hp2, hp3, indate, mstate) values (member_seq.nextval, #{username}, #{userid}, #{pwd}, #{hp1}, #{hp2}, #{hp3}, sysdate, 0)
mapper.update: update member set username=#{username}, pwd=#{pwd}, hp1=#{hp1}, hp2=#{hp2}, hp3=#{hp3}, mstate=#{mstate} where idx=#{idx}
